turns.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I'd be happy to help with your return request and the question about t-shirt options. To get started, I need to authenticate your identity for security purposes. Could you please provide your email address? If you don't remember it, we can try locating your account using your first name, last name, and zip code instead.
I'm not sure about my email right now—I've forgotten it. My name is Yusuf Rossi, and my zip code is 19122. Will that work to find my account?
